mapper.select:
select u.MOBILE_PHONE as loginAcct, u.LINKMAN as linkman, IFNULL(r.CAR_USER_TYPE, -1) as carUserType, u.TENANT_ID as attachTenantId, def.name as attachTenantName, def.link_man as attachTennantLinkman, def.link_phone as attachTennantLinkPhone, (SELECT count(*) from tenant_vehicle_rel where tenant_vehicle_rel.tenant_Id=r.TENANT_ID and tenant_vehicle_rel.DRIVER_USER_ID = r.user_id) as vehicleNum, IFNULL(r.STATE, -1) as state, IFNULL(r.HAS_VER,0) as hasVer, IFNULL(u.id,0) as userId, DATE_FORMAT(r.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createDate , IFNULL(r.id,0) as relId, r.state_reason as authReason, r.AUTH_MAN_ID as authUserId, r.AUTH_ORG_ID as authOrgId, u.identification as identification, DATE_FORMAT(u.DRIVER_LICENSE_EXPIRED_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as driverLicenseExpiredTime, DATE_FORMAT(u.QC_CERTI_EXPIRED_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as qcCertiExpriedTime from user_data_info u LEFT JOIN sys_tenant_def def ON def.ID = u.TENANT_ID left JOIN TENANT_USER_REL r on r.USER_ID = u.ID WHERE r.TENANT_ID=#{tenantId} AND u.user_type IN (${userType})
AND u.tenant_Id=-1
AND r.HAS_VER = 0
AND DATE_FORMAT(u.DRIVER_LICENSE_EXPIRED_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') < DATE_FORMAT(#{expiredDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND DATE_FORMAT(u.QC_CERTI_EXPIRED_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') < DATE_FORMAT(#{expiredDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND r.CAR_USER_TYPE = #{doQueryDriversVo.carUserType}
AND def.name like CONCAT('%',#{doQueryDriversVo.attachTenantName},'%')
AND def.link_man like CONCAT('%',#{doQueryDriversVo.attachTennantLinkman},'%')
AND def.link_phone like CONCAT('%',#{doQueryDriversVo.attachTennantLinkPhone },'%')
AND u.MOBILE_PHONE = #{doQueryDriversVo.loginAcct}
AND r.state = #{doQueryDriversVo.state}
AND u.LINKMAN like CONCAT('%',#{doQueryDriversVo.linkman },'%')
ORDER BY r.id DESC

select u.MOBILE_PHONE as loginAcct, u.LINKMAN as linkman, IFNULL(r.CAR_USER_TYPE, -1) as carUserType, u.TENANT_ID as attachTenantId, def.name as attachTenantName, def.link_man as attachTennantLinkman, def.link_phone as attachTennantLinkPhone, (SELECT count(*) from tenant_vehicle_rel where tenant_vehicle_rel.tenant_Id=r.TENANT_ID and tenant_vehicle_rel.DRIVER_USER_ID = r.user_id) as vehicleNum, IFNULL(r.STATE, -1) as state, IFNULL(r.HAS_VER,0) as hasVer, IFNULL(u.id,0) as userId, DATE_FORMAT(r.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createDate , IFNULL(r.id,0) as relId, r.state_reason as authReason, r.AUTH_MAN_ID as authUserId, r.AUTH_ORG_ID as authOrgId, u.identification as identification, DATE_FORMAT(u.DRIVER_LICENSE_EXPIRED_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as driverLicenseExpiredTime, DATE_FORMAT(u.QC_CERTI_EXPIRED_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as qcCertiExpriedTime from user_data_info u LEFT JOIN sys_tenant_def def ON def.ID = u.TENANT_ID left JOIN TENANT_USER_REL r on r.USER_ID = u.ID WHERE r.TENANT_ID=#{tenantId} AND u.user_type IN (${userType})
AND u.tenant_Id=-1
AND r.HAS_VER = 0
AND DATE_FORMAT(u.DRIVER_LICENSE_EXPIRED_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') < DATE_FORMAT(#{expiredDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND DATE_FORMAT(u.QC_CERTI_EXPIRED_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') < DATE_FORMAT(#{expiredDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND r.CAR_USER_TYPE = #{doQueryDriversVo.carUserType}
AND def.name like CONCAT('%',#{doQueryDriversVo.attachTenantName},'%')
AND def.link_man like CONCAT('%',#{doQueryDriversVo.attachTennantLinkman},'%')
AND def.link_phone like CONCAT('%',#{doQueryDriversVo.attachTennantLinkPhone },'%')
AND u.MOBILE_PHONE = #{doQueryDriversVo.loginAcct}
AND r.state = #{doQueryDriversVo.state}
AND u.LINKMAN like CONCAT('%',#{doQueryDriversVo.linkman },'%')
AND u.id <> #{doQueryDriversVo.driverUserId}
ORDER BY r.id DESC

SELECT u.MOBILE_PHONE mobilePhone, u.LINKMAN linkman, u.identification identification, u.TENANT_ID tenantId, def.NAME attachTenantName, def.link_man attachTenantLinkman, def.link_phone attachTenantLinkPhone, ( SELECT count(*) from vehicle_data_info where vehicle_data_info.driver_user_id=u.id ) AS vehicleNum, u.id userId, ifnull(u.AUTH_STATE,1) state, u.HAS_VER hasVer, u.VERIF_REASON authReason, ifnull(u.AUTH_MAN_ID,-1) authUserId, u.id relId, u.create_time createDate FROM user_data_info u LEFT JOIN TENANT_USER_REL r ON r.USER_ID = u.ID AND r.CAR_USER_TYPE = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_tenant_def def ON def.id = r.TENANT_ID WHERE u.user_type IN ( 3 )
AND def.name like CONCAT('%',#{doQueryOBMDriversVo.attachTenantName},'%')
AND def.link_man like CONCAT('%',#{doQueryOBMDriversVo.attachTenantLinkman},'%')
AND def.link_phone like CONCAT('%',#{doQueryOBMDriversVo.attachTenantLinkPhone},'%')
AND u.MOBILE_PHONE = #{doQueryOBMDriversVo.loginAcct}
and (u.AUTH_STATE = 1 or u.AUTH_STATE is null)
and u.AUTH_STATE = 2
AND u.LINKMAN like CONCAT('%',#{doQueryOBMDriversVo.linkman},'%')
AND u.TENANT_ID=-1 AND u.HAS_VER = 0
AND u.TENANT_ID=-1
AND u.TENANT_ID>0
AND DATE_FORMAT(u.create_time ,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S") >= DATE_FORMAT(#{doQueryOBMDriversVo.dateBegin} ,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S")
AND DATE_FORMAT(u.create_time ,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S") <= DATE_FORMAT(#{doQueryOBMDriversVo.dateEnd} ,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S")
ORDER BY u.create_time DESC

select apply_record.id id, user_data_info.mobile_phone mobilePhone, user_data_info.linkman linkman, apply_record.apply_car_user_type applyCarUserType, apply_record.be_apply_tenant_id beApplyTenantId, sys_tenant_def.name attachTenantName, sys_tenant_def.link_phone attachTennantLinkPhone, apply_record.create_time createDate, apply_record.state state, apply_record.read_state readState, apply_record.audit_remark auditRemark, apply_record.audit_date auditDate, apply_record.new_apply_id newApplyId from apply_record left join sys_tenant_def on apply_record.be_apply_tenant_id = sys_tenant_def.id, user_data_info where apply_record.busi_id=user_data_info.id and apply_record.apply_tenant_id=#{tenantId} and apply_record.apply_type=1
and user_data_info.mobile_phone like CONCAT('%',#{applyRecordQueryDto.billId },'%')
and sys_tenant_def.name like CONCAT('%',#{applyRecordQueryDto.tenantName },'%')
and sys_tenant_def.link_phone like CONCAT('%',#{applyRecordQueryDto.tenantLinkPhone },'%')
and apply_record.apply_car_user_type =#{applyRecordQueryDto.carUserType }
and apply_record.state =#{applyRecordQueryDto.applyState }
GROUP BY user_data_info.mobile_phone,APPLY_RECORD.ID ORDER BY APPLY_RECORD.ID DESC

select apply_record.id id, user_data_info.mobile_phone mobilePhone, user_data_info.linkman linkman, apply_record.apply_car_user_type applyCarUserType, apply_record.be_apply_tenant_id beApplyTenantId, sys_tenant_def.name attachTenantName, sys_tenant_def.link_phone attachTennantLinkPhone, apply_record.create_time createDate, apply_record.state state, apply_record.read_state readState, apply_record.audit_remark auditRemark, apply_record.audit_date auditDate, apply_record.new_apply_id newApplyId from apply_record left join sys_tenant_def on apply_record.apply_tenant_id = sys_tenant_def.id, user_data_info where apply_record.busi_id=user_data_info.id and apply_record.be_apply_tenant_id=#{tenantId} and apply_record.apply_type=1
and user_data_info.mobile_phone like CONCAT('%',#{applyRecordQueryDto.billId },'%')
and sys_tenant_def.name like CONCAT('%',#{applyRecordQueryDto.tenantName },'%')
and sys_tenant_def.link_phone like CONCAT('%',#{applyRecordQueryDto.tenantLinkPhone },'%')
and apply_record.apply_car_user_type =#{applyRecordQueryDto.carUserType }
and apply_record.state =#{applyRecordQueryDto.applyState }
ORDER BY APPLY_RECORD.ID DESC

select s.LOGIN_ACCT as loginAcct, u.LINKMAN as linkMan, r.CAR_USER_TYPE as carUserType, ifnull(u.TENANT_ID,-1) as attachTenantId, def.name as attachTenantName, def.link_man as attachTennantLinkman, def.link_phone as attachTennantLinkPhone, ifnull(u.id,0) as userId, r.create_date as createDate, ifnull(r.rel_id,0) as relId, ifnull(r.state_reason,'-') as authReason from user_data_info u left JOIN sys_tenant_def def ON def.id = u.TENANT_ID , TENANT_USER_REL_VER r inner JOIN sys_user s on s.user_info_id = r.USER_ID WHERE r.USER_ID = u.ID and r.TENANT_ID=#{tenantId} AND u.user_type IN (1,3) AND r.ver_state=9
AND r.CAR_USER_TYPE = #{driverQueryDto.carUserType}
AND def.name like CONCAT('%',#{driverQueryDto.attachTenantName },'%')
AND s.LOGIN_ACCT =#{driverQueryDto.loginAcct }
AND def.link_man like CONCAT('%',#{driverQueryDto.attachTennantLinkman },'%')
AND def.link_phone like CONCAT('%',#{driverQueryDto.attachTennantLinkPhone },'%')
AND u.LINKMAN like CONCAT('%',#{driverQueryDto.linkman },'%')
ORDER BY r.create_time DESC
select * from tenant_Vehicle_Rel a, vehicle_Data_Info b where a.vehicle_Code=b.id and b.driver_User_Id=#{userId} and a.tenant_Id=#{tenantId}
SELECT linkman FROM user_data_info WHERE id IN (${userIdList})

SELECT u.id AS userId, u.linkman AS linkman, u.mobile_phone AS mobilePhone, r.car_user_type AS carUserType, u.tenant_id as tenantId, IFNULL(r.STATE, -1) AS state FROM user_data_info u LEFT JOIN tenant_user_rel r ON u.id = r.user_id AND r.tenant_id = #{tenantId}
u.user_type = 3 AND ( u.tenant_id = - 1 OR u.tenant_id IS NULL OR EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM tenant_user_rel r WHERE r.user_id = u.id AND r.tenant_id = #{tenantId} ) )
and u.linkman like concat('%',#{linkman},'%')
and u.mobile_phone like concat('%',#{loginAcct},'%')
order by r.create_time desc
select * from user_data_info where mobile_phone = #{mobilePhone} limit 0,1

SELECT apply_record.id id, user_data_info.mobile_phone mobilePhone, user_data_info.USER_PRICE userPrice, apply_record.apply_car_user_type applyCarUserType, apply_record.be_apply_tenant_id beApplyTenantId, sys_tenant_def.NAME tenantName, sys_tenant_def.LINK_MAN tennantLinkMan, sys_tenant_def.link_phone tennantLinkPhone, sys_tenant_def.STATE tenantState, apply_record.create_date createDate, apply_record.state state, apply_record.APPLY_REMARK applyRemark, apply_record.APPLY_FILE_ID applyFile, apply_record.audit_remark auditRemark, apply_record.audit_date auditDate, apply_record.new_apply_id newApplyId FROM apply_record LEFT JOIN sys_tenant_def ON apply_record.be_apply_tenant_id = sys_tenant_def.id, user_data_info WHERE apply_record.busi_id = user_data_info.id and apply_record.id=#{applyId}

SELECT apply_record.id id, user_data_info.mobile_phone mobilePhone, user_data_info.user_price userPrice, apply_record.apply_car_user_type applyCarUserType, apply_record.be_apply_tenant_id beApplyTenantId, sys_tenant_def.NAME tenantName, sys_tenant_def.LINK_MAN tennantLinkMan, sys_tenant_def.link_phone tennantLinkPhone, apply_record.create_time createDate, apply_record.state state, apply_record.APPLY_REMARK applyRemark, apply_record.APPLY_FILE_ID applyFile, apply_record.audit_remark auditRemark, apply_record.audit_date auditDate, apply_record.new_apply_id newApplyId, apply_record.busi_id userId, apply_record.apply_tenant_id tenantId, apply_record.apply_driver_user_id applyDriverUserId, apply_record.apply_plate_numbers applyPlateNumbers, ( SELECT count(*) FROM tenant_vehicle_rel WHERE tenant_vehicle_rel.driver_user_id = apply_record.busi_id AND tenant_vehicle_rel.tenant_Id = apply_record.be_apply_tenant_id ) vehicleNum FROM apply_record LEFT JOIN sys_tenant_def ON apply_record.apply_tenant_id = sys_tenant_def.id, user_data_info WHERE apply_record.busi_id = user_data_info.id AND apply_record.id = #{applyId}

SELECT vehicle_data_info.plate_number plateNumber, vehicle_Length vehicleLength, vehicle_Status vehicleStatus FROM vehicle_data_info, tenant_vehicle_rel WHERE vehicle_data_info.id = tenant_vehicle_rel.vehicle_Code AND vehicle_data_info.driver_user_id =#{userId} AND tenant_vehicle_rel.tenant_Id =#{tenantId} AND tenant_vehicle_rel.VEHICLE_CLASS = 1 AND tenant_vehicle_rel.AUTH_STATE=2
select * from user_data_info u where u.mobile_phone =#{mobilePhone} ORDER BY u.id desc

select apply_record.id id, user_data_info.mobile_phone mobilePhone, user_data_info.linkman linkman, apply_record.apply_car_user_type applyCarUserType, apply_record.be_apply_tenant_id beApplyTenantId, sys_tenant_def.name attachTenantName, sys_tenant_def.link_phone attachTennantLinkPhone, apply_record.create_time createDate, apply_record.state state, apply_record.read_state readState, apply_record.audit_remark auditRemark, apply_record.audit_date auditDate, apply_record.new_apply_id newApplyId from apply_record left join sys_tenant_def on apply_record.apply_tenant_id = sys_tenant_def.id, user_data_info where apply_record.busi_id=user_data_info.id and apply_record.be_apply_tenant_id=#{tenantId} and apply_record.apply_type=1
and user_data_info.mobile_phone like CONCAT('%',#{applyRecordQueryVo.billId },'%')
and sys_tenant_def.name like CONCAT('%',#{applyRecordQueryVo.tenantName },'%')
and user_data_info.mobile_phone like CONCAT('%',#{applyRecordQueryVo.mobilePhone },'%')
and apply_record.apply_car_user_type = #{applyRecordQueryVo.carUserType}
and apply_record.state = #{applyRecordQueryVo.applyState}
and apply_record.apply_car_user_type in (${applyRecordQueryVo.carUserTypes})
and apply_record.state in (${applyRecordQueryVo.states})
ORDER BY APPLY_RECORD.ID DESC

SELECT udi.id AS userid, udi.linkman AS linkman, udi.mobile_phone AS mobilephone, udi.identification AS identification, so.id AS operatorid, so.login_acct AS loginacct, so.PASSWORD AS PASSWORD, tsr.id AS staffid, tsr.employee_number AS employeenumber, tsr.staff_position AS staffposition, tsr.lock_flag AS lockflag, ( SELECT group_concat( o.role_id ) FROM sys_role_oper_rel o WHERE o.state = 1 AND o.operator_id = so.id AND o.tenant_id = tsr.tenant_id GROUP BY o.operator_id ) AS roleids, ( SELECT group_concat( u.org_id ) FROM sys_user_org_rel u WHERE u.state = 1 AND u.id = udi.id AND u.tenant_id = tsr.tenant_id GROUP BY u.id ) AS orgids, attached_org_id AS attachedOrgId FROM user_data_info udi INNER JOIN sys_user so ON udi.id = so.user_info_id INNER JOIN tenant_staff_rel tsr ON udi.id = tsr.user_info_id WHERE tsr.state =1
AND udi.id = #{staffDataInfoIn.userId}
AND so.LOGIN_ACCT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{staffDataInfoIn.loginAcct},'%')
AND udi.MOBILE_PHONE LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{staffDataInfoIn.mobilePhone}),'%')
AND udi.LINKMAN LIKE CONCAT('%',#{staffDataInfoIn.linkman},'%')
AND tsr.EMPLOYEE_NUMBER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{staffDataInfoIn.employeeNumber},'%')
AND tsr.STAFF_POSITION LIKE CONCAT('%',#{staffDataInfoIn.staffPosition},'%')
AND tsr.LOCK_FLAG = #{staffDataInfoIn.lockFlag}
AND tsr.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId}
AND exists(SELECT * FROM sys_user_org_rel suor WHERE suor.TENANT_ID = tsr.TENANT_ID AND suor.USER_ID=udi.USER_ID AND suor.ORG_ID = #{staffDataInfoIn.orgId})
order by tsr.CREATE_DATE desc

SELECT r.tenant_id as tenantId, count(1) as count FROM user_data_info u LEFT JOIN sys_tenant_def def ON def.ID = u.TENANT_ID LEFT JOIN TENANT_USER_REL r ON r.USER_ID = u.ID WHERE u.user_type IN ( 1, 3 ) and u.DRIVER_LICENSE_EXPIRED_TIME <= now() and r.tenant_id is not null group by r.tenant_id

SELECT r.tenant_id as tenant_id, count(1) as count FROM user_data_info u LEFT JOIN sys_tenant_def def ON def.ID = u.TENANT_ID LEFT JOIN TENANT_USER_REL r ON r.USER_ID = u.ID WHERE u.user_type IN ( 1, 3 ) and u.qc_certi_expired_time <= now() and r.tenant_id is not null group by r.tenant_id

SELECT r.tenant_id, IFNULL( COUNT( 1 ), 0 ) AS count FROM user_data_info u LEFT JOIN sys_tenant_def def ON def.ID = u.TENANT_ID LEFT JOIN TENANT_USER_REL r ON r.USER_ID = u.ID WHERE user_type IN ( 1, 3 ) and r.tenant_id is not null GROUP BY r.tenant_id

SELECT u.tenant_id tenantid FROM user_data_info u LEFT JOIN tenant_user_rel r ON r.user_id = u.id AND r.car_user_type = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_tenant_def def ON def.id = r.tenant_id WHERE u.user_type IN ( 3 ) AND u.id = #{userId}

select u.MOBILE_PHONE as loginAcct, u.LINKMAN as linkman, IFNULL(r.CAR_USER_TYPE, -1) as carUserType, u.TENANT_ID as attachTenantId, def.name as attachTenantName, def.link_man as attachTennantLinkman, def.link_phone as attachTennantLinkPhone, (SELECT count(*) from tenant_vehicle_rel where tenant_vehicle_rel.tenant_Id=r.TENANT_ID and tenant_vehicle_rel.DRIVER_USER_ID = r.user_id) as vehicleNum, IFNULL(r.STATE, -1) as state, IFNULL(r.HAS_VER,0) as hasVer, IFNULL(u.id,0) as userId, DATE_FORMAT(r.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createDate , IFNULL(r.id,0) as relId, r.state_reason as authReason, r.AUTH_MAN_ID as authUserId, r.AUTH_ORG_ID as authOrgId, u.identification as identification, DATE_FORMAT(u.DRIVER_LICENSE_EXPIRED_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as driverLicenseExpiredTime, DATE_FORMAT(u.QC_CERTI_EXPIRED_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as qcCertiExpriedTime from user_data_info u LEFT JOIN sys_tenant_def def ON def.ID = u.TENANT_ID left JOIN TENANT_USER_REL r on r.USER_ID = u.ID WHERE r.TENANT_ID=#{tenantId} AND u.user_type IN (${userType})
AND u.tenant_Id=-1
AND r.HAS_VER = 0
AND DATE_FORMAT(u.DRIVER_LICENSE_EXPIRED_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') < DATE_FORMAT(#{expiredDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND DATE_FORMAT(u.QC_CERTI_EXPIRED_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') < DATE_FORMAT(#{expiredDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND r.CAR_USER_TYPE in (${carUserTypeStr})
AND def.name like CONCAT('%',#{doQueryDriversVo.attachTenantName},'%')
AND def.link_man like CONCAT('%',#{doQueryDriversVo.attachTennantLinkman},'%')
AND def.link_phone like CONCAT('%',#{doQueryDriversVo.attachTennantLinkPhone },'%')
AND u.MOBILE_PHONE = #{doQueryDriversVo.loginAcct}
AND r.state = #{doQueryDriversVo.state}
AND u.LINKMAN like CONCAT('%',#{doQueryDriversVo.linkman },'%')
AND u.id <> #{doQueryDriversVo.driverUserId}
ORDER BY r.id DESC
